title: Rising price should drive up Catering Inc output

content.description: Catering, Inc., which provides catering services in a perfectly competitive market, was maximizing profits at the market price of $22 per meal. The market price has recently increased to $28 per meal.
content.question: Which of the following short-run adjustments will increase profits for Catering, Inc.?

choices.label: Increasing output until the marginal cost equals the new price
Increasing output until the average total cost equals the new price
Decreasing output because of the increase in market price
Increasing the wage rate paid to its workers
Increasing advertising to increase demand for the meals

content.answer: Increasing output until the marginal cost equals the new price

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
